projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

interpretation.p:
Interpretive markup which is visible only in analytic transformations of this file consists of:
Highlighting in hi elements,
Corruptions in sic elements,
Remarks in note elements with the @resp attribute identifying the agency.

lg.l: taṃ satpathajñaṃ praṇipatya buddhaṃ śāstraṃ kariṣyāmyabhidharmadīpam //
kliṣṭameva hi vijñānaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ janmani śrayāt /
nabhaḥ khalu nabho dhātorāsanno hetureṣa tu /
na śubhaṃ nāpi ca kliṣṭaṃ dvitīyādiṣu darśakam //
spṛśyaṃ dvidhā sadharmāṃśāḥ saha tā nava bhautikāḥ /
daśa sāvayavā mūrtāḥ ta eva daśa saṃcitāḥ //
na hyūrdhvaṃ cakṣuṣaḥ kāyo na rūpaṃ nākṣijaṃ manaḥ /
vijñānasya tu netrārthastau ca kāyasya savaṃtaḥ //
nopariṣṭācchru teḥ kāyo na śabdo na svakaṃ manaḥ /
vijñānasya tu nihrādastau ca kāyasya sarvataḥ //
tadā saṃyojanaṃ tvāryaḥ paryādatte na kiñcana //
na tu saṃyojanaṃ kiñcitparyādatte tadā hyasau /
ābhāsvarācca vairāgyaṃ yāti hanti tu nāsravān //
śubhakṛtsnācca vairāgyaṃ yāti kleśānna hanti tu //
dvivijñeyāḥ guṇāḥ pañca hetuḥ sarve kṣarākṣarāḥ /
nāmnā dvāviṃśatistāni dravyato daśa sapta ca /
śraddhādīnāṃ vidāṃ caiva doṣaḥ śuddhau malodaye /
kāyasya bādhanaṃ duḥkhaṃ daurmanasyaṃ tu cetasaḥ /
sukhaṃ ca sumanastā ca sātaṃ śārīramānasam //
kāyasya bādhanaṃ duḥkhaṃ daurmanasyaṃ tu cetasaḥ /
sukhaṃ ca sumanastā ca sātaṃ śārīramānasam //
navābhyāsapraheyāṇi dvidhā pañca na tu trayam //
pūrvaṃ kramodbhavaiḥ kāme vipāko labhyate dvayam /
anyaiḥ ṣaṭ sapta vāṣṭau vā ṣaḍ rūpe antye tu jīvitam //
daśāṣṭau nava catvāri kāme pañca śubhāni vā //
samyaktvaniyatā ye tu ye ca śraddhādhimuktikāḥ /
cittaṃ caitasikaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ tu svalakṣaṇaiḥ //
kliṣṭe ṣaṭ aśubhe tu dve āhrīkyamanapatrapā //
ādilābhe saha prākca tadūrdhvaṃ vā tridheṣyate //
kliṣṭāṇāṃ kuśalānāṃ ca tadanyeṣāṃ tridhā matā /
na śrutyā śrūyate śabdastadanyā ca gatiḥ śruteḥ /
tathaiva ca vipākaśca sābhāgyaṃ prāptayo dvidhā //
kāyikaṃ vāṅmayaṃ caiva cetanākhyaṃ ca mānasam /
etānyo yāti śaraṇaṃ sa yāti śaraṇatrayam //
bhūsaṃcāreṇa hānyā ca tyajyate dhyānajaṃ śubham //
satkṣetre kriyate yacca phalaṃ tasya niyamyate //
navame cetanā yā tu sā kṛṣṇākṛṣṇayāghātinī /
śubhāḥ sapta dvidhā jñeyā ekadhaite samāhitāḥ //
prāṇinaścātha bhogāśca nāmarūpaṃ ca nāma ca //
phalaṃ śubhasya catvāri dve trīṇi ca śubhādayaḥ //
śubhādyāstvaśubhasya dve trīṇi catvāri ca kramāt /
avyākṛtasya te tu dve trīṇi trīṇi śubhādayaḥ //
ekaṃ trīṇi dvayaṃ caiva śaikṣādyāḥ paścimasya tu /
dve dve pañca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ dṛggheyasya tu karmaṇaḥ //
trīṇi catvāri caikaṃ ca dṛṣṭiheyādayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
te tvabhyāsapraheyasya dve catvāri tridhā matāḥ //
kartṛtā bhoktṛtā coktā niṣiddhā śāśvatasya tu //
dviṣatāmapi yaṃ dṛṣṭvā manaḥ sadyaḥ prasīdati //
buddhotpāde naraḥ strī vā tadādyaṃ cittamaśnute //
bhavāgre kṣāntiheyā ye dṛggheyā eva te matāḥ /
ahaṃ mameti yā dṛṣṭirasau satkāyadṛk smṛtā /
dravyato daśa caikaśca nāmnā sapta tu te matāḥ /
avidyā dhīśca tṛṣṇā ca na kāṅkṣāmānadṛṣṭayaḥ //
ebhyo yaḥ prathamo vādī bhajate sādhutāmasau /
vada somya kathaṃ yāti pratītyā vastu vastutām //
ko vighnaḥ aṅgavaikalyam na tatsarvāstitā sadā /
tatkathaṃ śrūyatāṃ sadbhyaḥ durbodhā khalu dharmatā //
tathā śaktistathā velā tathā sattā tathā kriyā //
catvāraḥ parivṛtte sve rūpāptāḥ khalvapi trayaḥ /
rūpāpte prathame 'dhastāt trayaḥ sve khalvapi trayaḥ //
duḥkhendriye tu kāmāptaḥ svaireva saha sarvagaiḥ /
bhavatyanantaraṃ ṣaḍ vā tasyorddhvaṃ pañca pañca vā //
ekaṃ vā pañca vā ṣaḍ vā sapta vā yadi vā daśa //
vyavidyāḥ sakalāḥ kleśāḥ kāme kāmāsravo mataḥ /
sāvidyā dve upādāne yathāktau dve tu dṛṅmaye /
ādyantye dve dṛśau kāṅkṣākāmacchando dvireva yaḥ /
dvābhyāṃ māyā tathā śāṭhyaṃ mrakṣo middhaṃ tathaiva ca //
saṃmukhe nāma jātāstu tisra eva vinirdiśet //
āryasya khalu vairāgyaprayoge kṣepaṇe pi ca /
punastridhā tridhā kṛtvā trīnato rūpagā nava /
buddho yastadguṇe śraddhā prasādaḥ sa jine mataḥ //
pūrvoktaiva hi yā bodhiḥ sā samyagjñānamucyate /
ākhyātā dhātavaḥ sūtre tridhā bhedo hyapekṣayā //
caturthī pañcamī ṣaṣṭhī vidyāt saptasu bhūmiṣu //
mārgākhye tvanvayajñāne ṣaḍ bhāvyante 'tha sapta vā /
aṣṭākāraṃ dvitīyaṃ tu navajñānamayaṃ tu yat //
sandhau sandhau ca buddhasya kāyenārāyaṇaṃ balam /
divyamavyākṛtaṃ śrotraṃ netraṃ cānyā śubhā matāḥ /
harato dve kuśāstṛbhyo mārebhyo harate param //
rūpasparśau matau rūpe sveśarīre 'tha vā bahiḥ //
tallābho dhyānavat jñeyaḥ śuddhakācca svataśca tat /
ekasya bruvataḥ sarve nirmitā bruvate samam //
bhedena tu samāpattidravyāṇi daśa sapta ca /
tathaiva traya ārūpyā bhavāgraṃ tu dvidhā matam //
sāmantāni dvidhā sapta prathamaṃ tu tridhā matam /
tṛtīye pañcame prajñā smṛtyupekṣā sukhaṃ sthitiḥ /
antye catvāryupekṣe dve samādhiḥ smṛtireva ca /
kliṣṭe dhyāne caturthe tu dve aṅge vedanā sthitiḥ //
dravyātmanā daśaikaṃ ca nāmnā tvaṣṭau daśaiva ca /
dhyātā proktastathā dhyeyaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyānaphalaṃ tathā /
dve trīṇi trīṇi ca dve vā hānapakṣyādyanantaram //
śuddhakācca tṛtīyaṃ svaṃ niṣṭhā śuddhācca nirmalam //
